name: Reflexion (Nicows)
description:
Do you really know your multiplication tables ?

Use your reflex and knowledge of your multiplication tables to get the best score.

2 modes :

  •  Levels : 1 to 10
  • Infini : generate random multiplications. Try to get the best score.

3 difficulties :

  • Slow : 10 secondes to clic
  • Normal : 5 secondes
  • Fast : 2 secondes

21 avatars to choose :

They are all free so you can choose the one you like the most.
